pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, November 2, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.

1:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual discussion with the Downtown Surrey Business Improvement Association, hosted by Member of Parliament for Surrey Centre Randeep Sarai.

1:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual discussion with Folklorama and cultural community leaders in Winnipeg, along with Member of Parliament for Winnipeg North Kevin Lamoureux.

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually visit a grade 11 math class at Immaculata High School in Ottawa, with Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Catherine McKenna.

Closed to media.

Media appearances

8:10 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on ICI Première Québec.

8:30 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on Rouge FM Québec.
